movies.title: Full Metal Jacket
movies.plot: A pragmatic U.S. Marine observes the dehumanizing effects the U.S.-Vietnam War has on his fellow recruits from their brutal boot camp training to the bloody street fighting in Hue.
movies.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 8 wins & 13 nominations.

events.title: the Tet Offensive attacks Da Nang

movies.title: We Were Soldiers
movies.plot: The story of the first major battle of the American phase of the Vietnam War and the soldiers on both sides that fought it.

studios.title: Motion Picture Production GmbH & Co. Erste KG

events.title: a French unit is ambushed by the Viet Minh
Lt. Col. Moore orders 1st Lt. Charlie Hastings to call in "Broken Arrow"
American forces take the landing zone

movies.title: Danger Close
movies.plot: Vietnam War, 1966. Australia and New Zealand send troops to support the United States and South Vietnamese in their fight against the communist North. Soldiers are very young men, recruits and volunteers who have never been involved in a combat. On August 18th, members of Delta Company will face the true horror of a ruthless battle among the trees of a rubber plantation called Long Tân. They are barely a hundred. The enemy is a human wave ready to destroy them.

movies.title: Mean Girls
movies.plot: Cady Heron is a hit with The Plastics, the A-list girl clique at her new school, until she makes the mistake of falling for Aaron Samuels, the ex-boyfriend of alpha Plastic Regina George.
